comments:
CSSNodeAdapter does not implement IJFaceNodeAdapter.  But if you call CSSNodeAdapter.isAdapterForType(IJFaceNodeAdapter.class) you will get true.  This leads callers to assume you can typecast CSSNodeAdapter to IJFaceNodeAdapter, when you really can't.

I found this problem when I got the following exception when I was in the Debug Offset dialog (Selection tab) while editing CSS.

I'll take a crack at it since it's supposed just be a matter of moving methods from JFaceNodeContentProviderCSS & JFaceNodeLabelProviderCSS to CSSNodeAdapter.
fixed as mentioned in previous comment
